1.0.1.name: wordpress/tinychat
1.0.1.description:
Tinychat offers and webchat client supporting several hundre of users. Also support multiple users broadcasting webcam and private chat. This plugin incorporates this in to your wordpress blogg / site and gives your visitors the ability chat, and share there experiance of your site!

  • FREE!
  • Webcam
  • Private Chat
  • Text chat
  • 100's of users
  • FREE!
  • Can limit to registerd users
  • Select Moderator roles
  • Easy to use!

Feel free to report any and all bugs you may find!
